author: JM Rieger
title: Trump shifts coronavirus testing rhetoric again as he encourages some states to reopen
description: Over the past month, the president has shifted his public assurances about coronavirus testing no fewer than five times.
content: Public health experts have said the lack of widespread testing and tracing could lead to second or third waves of the coronavirus, and economists have said reopening the economy too soon could hurt economic growth more in the long term than reduced growth in … [+3013 chars]
